com.here.android.mpa.guidance

Class NavigationManager.SafetySpotListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.SafetySpotListener
  • Enclosing class:
    NavigationManager

    public abstract static class NavigationManager.SafetySpotListener
extends java.lang.Object
    SafetySpotListener provides callback of safety spot related events from NavigationManager. By default, an empty implementation for the callback method is provided.

    No callback will be triggered if the HERE license key is invalid.
